xB-T163YNG_7zJrrnzh04Q.text: I love their bases, I don't know how they do it! There seems to be a Pizza Hut on nearly every street here so you won't have trouble finding one. They do good deals and seem to be part of the Tesco clubcard scheme for a bit.

lqkt_FhojTFwBCmuB0dcLA.text: The pizza was delivered faster than I would of expected. It was delicious. The whole family enjoyed it. We stayed at the holiday inn and they delivered the pizza that was hot and yummy. The chicken strips were good and my son ate them all.

ID0t_YtUfCXk3XvelHC2gQ.text: Don't go here for wings, they are embarrassingly small. You will be left sad and hungry.

0NijWBr8-7eXrps5hMXugQ.text: This Piazza Hut, being slightly off the beaten track, offers a slightly less intense dining experience than what passes for normal at a chain such as this.   I must confess that I actually really like Pizza Hut-brand junk food. This one suits me down to the ground because nobody I know will see me here. Unless they read this.   Which they won't.

zGaDt5KL-lCcamYmMd5_8g.text: Have ordered from here a few times, mainly when I've found a code for money off.   First time we ordered the base was solid in the middle, like bread goes when it's been microwaved!   But decided to give it another go and have ordered a couple of times since then and it's been fine. I really like the stuffed crust pizzas and they have quite a good choice of starters too. We love their desert, think it's called 'choccy bites' that's 48 tiny chocolate covered pieces of ice cream, they're great!

uvidVU2eUa3kVDvevmBN_w.text: Pizza hut pizza tends to be pretty much the same wherever you get it, but this one gets bonus points for polite staff that generally get your order right. Usually easiest to order online.

EOr2tPihWa5vnuJW533rNA.text: Pizza hut is great, they have yummy starters and a wide choice of foods. The foods are fresh and all pretty good. The name change to pasta hut is not a bad choice as the pasta is absolutely scrumptious. They have a great dessert, cookie dough which in my opinion is the best dessert ever.

qMW0Lsf6wiSnI9688yPpbg.text: Pizza hut offer the best pizza's in the UKby far

88yzZ2JUc9mWqE5RnzADVQ.text: I think the review below is confused. The address of the listed pizza hut is a delivery only. There is no table and you cant sit in. All pizzas are just normal pizza hut pizzas with the same menus. Yummy as always but not cheap for a pizza!

RdbPqO8gRdeQfqhNgCc1LA.text: I love this pizza hut as it is slightly outside city centre, it is much more chilled out and there seems to be less haste to eat. They do a great selection of pizza, pasta and extras and it is great value.  The staff are really friendly and it has a nice local feel to it as the staff always seem to know people eating there. There is not much room to eat in though but you can take away or have food delivered.

gpF4Zjl8vBZyi3WMoygimA.text: This Pizza Hut is always a pleasure to order with for my takeaways. Staff are very polite and are great at pointing out deals and making sure you get the best out of them possible. Deliveries always in good time, usually within about 20-30 minutes and I've never had a complaint about them. Orders arrive hot and just as ordered, and the delivery guys are always very polite, so I have no hesitation over tipping them! Actually, I've just realised that it is always guys, not sure why that is, don't girls get into pizza delivery? It may well be a safety thing I guess, but I've given myself something to ponder now! I've never dealt with any other Pizza Hut outlets, but if this one is anything to go by, you won't be disappointed. I do recall once having ordered two side portions of wedges and only receiving one - I told the delivery guy not to worry about it, on reflection it was just as well as I'm not sure my hips could take it! He arrived back at the door 20 minutes later, with the extra side portion, having already deducted the cost from my bill - what service!

OinwckZBhYx33ByawDGjGw.text: Pizza hut is always a restaurant I enjoy visiting and do not understand the recent name change to Pasta hut  but then again that is a different matter. The Edinburgh Pizza Hut is a clean, tidy restaurant with friendly and helpful staff. Whenever I visit Edinburgh, which is often, I enjoy a trip here for a quick bite to eat. The staff are helpful and were very understanding when my partner wasn't feeling well through a meal  they boxed everything up to go for us. The restaurant is easy to get to from the centre and close to the local Travelodge that I stay in. 5 stars!
